title: Drew Barrymore: Rewriting The Story | Wishful Thinking | 2
description:
When E.T. makes young Drew Barrymore a star, she can’t believe her luck. With Steven Spielberg himself in her corner, she finally has all the love and attention she’s always craved. But as it turns out, sometimes elementary school is even more cutthroat than Hollywood. And when she tries to fit in, Drew discovers she’s in for a rude awakening.


Binge the full season early and ad free with Wondery+ in the Wondery App. https://wondery.app.link/eventherich


And check out the brand new Even the Rich merch store at wonderyshop.com
